name: Tom Tice
coverLetter:
Hello, 

With my precision skills and fine attention to detail, I take pride in my work in harvesting quality product. I have been trimming wet and dry harvest for two years, and have been OLCC certified as a recreational marijuana worker. Being as professional as I can, I get along with my team in all work environments. Drama and conflict is avoidable and never necessary in the workplace. I have trimmed my own harvests and the grows of other people.
